content: this baby s security blanket is slightly oversized and cuddly enough for any infant or toddler perfect to crochet for baby shower gifts and gender neutral you really can t go wrong with this sweet little lamb pattern is one size but easily adjusted to make a larger or smaller security blanket this is an intermediate level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet increase and decrease bobble stitch explained in the pattern double_crochet skip stitches chain stitch and slip_stitch experience with amigurumi is always helpful
